timeline.message:
- Added a metric for the mean length of 3' softclips considering only those reads that have clipping on that end. This metric should provide an estimate for how much the mean insert-size should change for the amount of bases lost to soft-clipping (that which is due to the insert ending) to change significantly.
- I'm not especially happy with the name of the metric. if someone can come up with a  better name I'd be happy to change.
- included tests

- fix a bug in the definition of PCT_SOFTCLIP, PCT_HARDCLIP where the code would use the _aligned_ bases as denominator rather than the _total_ bases.
- fixed the tests to reflect this change.

- added a reverse "View" for an immutable (or any) List
- simplified clipping counting code
- fixed bug that would appear if there were two softclip operators in a row
- added tests

timeline.bodyText: Are these legal cigar strings? Doesn't the S operator have to come at the end? I guess it doesn't matter for this test and I agree with 6 for this length (and 0 for the one below).
timeline.author: meganshand

replies.bodyText:
From the spec:
• H can only be present as the first and/or last operation.
• S may only have H operations between them and the ends of the CIGAR string

so probably, no. but I wanted to make the code robust to this....
replies.author: yfarjoun
